lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qO kMcnY pwro prsq soK lyq; Agin mY fwry pun pwro auf jwq hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as mercury touching gold conceals its real colour but when put in a crucible regains its luster, while the mercury evaporates.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: kMcnY sony nUM prsq Cuhx nwl fwry pwieAwˆ puin iPr hY qy Su`D rUp ivc sonw pRgt ho jwˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ml mUqR lg AMbr mlIn hoq; swbn sill imil inrml gwq hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as clothes become dirty with filth and dust but when washed with soap and water become clean again.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ ml mUqR l`g ky k`pVw gMdw ho jwˆdw hY, pr swbx qy pwxI nwl imlw ky DoiqAwˆ mYl rihq ho jwˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Aih gRsy ibK bÎwpq sgl AMg; mMqR kY ibKY ibkwr sB su iblwq hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as snake-bite spreads poison in the whole body but with recitation of Garur jaap (a Mantra) all ill effects are destroyed.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ s`p dy fMigAwˆ srIr dy swry AMgwˆ ivc zihr PYl jwˆdI hY, pr gwrVU mMqR dy kIiqAwˆ zihr dw swrw ivgwV dUr ho jwˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy mwXw moh kY ibmohq mgn mn; gur aupdys mwXw mUl murJwq hY [557[

Unknown.translation: Similarly by listening to True Guru's word and meditating on it, all the effects of worldly vices and attachment are eliminated. (All the influence of worldly things (Maya) ends.)  (557)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqvyˆ mwieAw dy moh ivc gumrwh hoey lIn mn qy gur aupdyS pY ky mwieAw dIAwˆ jVHwˆ nUM sukw idMdw hY ]557]
